summary: Three stories about Shurik - a young student. He fights against criminals, falls in love, confuses apartments, passes exams - he lives after all.
cast: Aleksandr Demyanenko|Mikhail Pugovkin|Aleksei Smirnov|Vladimir Basov|Emmanuil Geller|Rina Zelyonaya|Viktor Uralskiy|Guseyn Akhundov|Valentina Berezutskaya|Svetlana Ageeva|Natalya Seleznyova|Vladimir Rautbart|Viktor Pavlov|Valeriy Nosik|Georgiy Georgiu|Natalya Gitserot|Zoya Fyodorova|Lyudmila Kovalets|Sergey Zhirnov|Viktor Zozulin|Georgiy Vitsin|Yuriy Nikulin|Evgeniy Morgunov|Vladimir Vladislavskiy|Mariya Kravchunovskaya|Vladimir Komarovskiy|Tatyana Gradova|Nina Golovina|Oleg Skvortsov|Ruslan Akhmetov|Glazauskas Cheslov|Nina Delektorskaya|Leonid Gaidai|Viktor Geraskin|Vladimir Gulyaev|Nikolay Kazakov|Valentina Pechorina|Vladimir Prikhodko|Emiliya Sudakova|Igor Surovtsev|Ivan Turchenkov|Vladimir Udalov
keywords: slapstick comedy|pretending to be blind|soviet union|student|old lady
title: Operatsiya 'Y' i drugie priklyucheniya Shurika
